pages.text: The following pages describe all curses in the game. $(br2)$(n)Primary Items:$() The items that can receive the enchantment legitimately in Survival mode by using an $(item)Enchanting Table$().  $(br2)$(n)Secondary Items:$() Items that, in Survival mode, cannot receive the enchantment from an $(item)Enchanting Table$() but can from an $(item)Enchanted Book$() with an $(item)Anvil$().

pages.title: Curse of Binding
pages.text: $(n)Effect:$() $(br)Items cannot be removed from armor slots.  $(br2)$(n)Primary Items:$() /  $(br2)$(n)Secondary Items:$() Equipment $(br2)$(n)Max Level:$() I

pages.title: Curse of Vanishing
pages.text: $(n)Effect:$() $(br)Item disappears on death.  $(br2)$(n)Primary Items:$() /  $(br2)$(n)Secondary Items:$() All Items $(br2)$(n)Max Level:$() I
